alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:57PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dale, southeastern Coffee, northwestern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Level Plains to 6 miles west of Hartford. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Geneva, Dothan, Hartford, Midland City, Level Plains, Samson, Newton, New Brockton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Coffee Springs, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald and Central City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
